column4: Hello all, I am using ubuntu 12.04 and check the issue with firefox and chrom and same problem, unclickable flash player settings when need to allow my camera and mic, any solution?
I know the whitelist from macromedia, but I dont want my users to go through this too, is it a bug in chrome or ubuntu
for unclickable flash player settings. ive heard you can  have a flash video go fullscreen. then you can  use the settings
